pros: Small organization with a focused mandate.  Super informal atmosphere.  Easy to share ideas and suggestions.  Located in a great section of Downtown Toronto.
cons: Dysfunctional sector.  Lots of politicking.  High turnover of executive staff.  No clear HR policies.  Organizational mandate is similar to other ASOs.  No opportunities for vertical or lateral growth.

pros: Good organisation, good people to work with.
cons: Organisation shut down after funding being cancelled by government.
